at.irian.ankor.system

Class WebSocketSpringBootServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.websocket.Endpoint
      • at.irian.ankor.switching.connector.websocket.WebSocketEndpoint
        • at.irian.ankor.system.WebSocketServerEndpoint
          • at.irian.ankor.system.WebSocketSpringBootServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.websocket.server.ServerApplicationConfig, org.springframework.boot.context.embedded.EmbeddedServletContainerCustomizer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimalsWebSocketSpringBootServer, TodoWebSocketSpringBootServer

    @EnableAutoConfiguration
public abstract class WebSocketSpringBootServer
extends WebSocketServerEndpoint
implements org.springframework.boot.context.embedded.EmbeddedServletContainerCustomizer
    Websocket-based Spring Boot Standalone Server. The path "at.irian.ankor.spring" is scanned for Spring beans. So the SpringBasedBeanFactory is automatically getting found. Application implementors have to provide a Spring bean of type Application.

    Ankor Spring Boot Applications are typically started in a main method like so:
